title: It's Nice To Have A Friend
description:
It's such a sweet song but everything Taylor Swift writes, it has many meanings. What all is she saying in the shortest song in her entire discography? And did her bestie's old tweet prove this popular theory? Lacey, Nick, Amy and Ana discuss it all!
What did we miss? What would you like to hear from us? There are lots of ways to contact us!

CONTACT THE PODCAST!
